layout.singingstanza: Had my Sub -- sti -- tute not re -- turned, How could my heart its fears re -- strain? Was He im -- pli -- cat -- ed in my sin? Un -- a -- ble to save, in -- stead de -- tained?

lyrics.stanza: Had not my Substitute returned, How could my heart its fears restrain? Was He implicated in my sin? Unable to save, instead detained?
Could it be He could not forgive My sins so great, so numerous? Could His dear blood be limited In scope and in effectiveness?
Rejoice! For Jesus rose again Not harmed, but further glorified; Though He passed through the dark domain, All its effect He nullified.
God's righteousness is satisfied By Christ's return, this fact's made known. From God's great love, His mercy's shown, The Lord's redeeming work is done.
Redemption's work God recognized, Gave proof by resurrecting Christ; Oh, Hallelujah! No more stain! Hallelujah! Full pardon gained!
